name: Sköna
description:
We are Sköna. We transform tech companies into tech brands.
Sköna is a full-service B2B creative agency specializing in marketing, branding, and design for innovative tech companies. Founded 15 years ago in Silicon Valley and with an office in Stockholm, we offer the perfect blend of Silicon Valley high-tech expertise and Scandinavian sensibility.
We solve tough business problems with strategy, design, and smarts. The result? A kick-start for major growth around a brand people will love.
